Grocer Evia:

That's great! Press ALT+K to open the Skill window. That's where you can learn new skills.

The skills you've already learned can be dragged to the shortcuts or the auto-use slots. The later lets you use them while auto-hunting.

One more thing! Don't forget to change your class in time.

This about covers everything you need to know to survive out in the world. You will still need some help though. Fortunately, I met a real stand up guy when I was out on a supply run. He told me that I should send any Sylphs that venture into the big wide world his way. His name is Bathis, he's Captain of Gludio. You should definitely talk to him.
